text:
e="preserve">Terry Tyree Glenn (July 23, 1974 – November 20, 2017) was an American college and professional football player. He was born in Columbus, Ohio. He was a wide receiver in the National Football League (NFL) for 12 seasons. He played college football for Ohio State University. He was drafted by the New England Patriots seventh overall in 1996, and also played for the Green Bay Packers and Dallas Cowboys.
Glenn died in a car crash in Irving, Texas on November 20, 2017 at the age of 43.
